mapper.insert: insert into product_to_category(id, name, description,state, merchant_name,merchant_id,been_deleted,images) values (#{id}, #{name},#{description},#{state}, #{merchant_name},#{merchant_id},#{images})
mapper.update: update product_category set name=#{u.name}, description=#{u.description}, state=#{u.state}, merchant_name=#{u.merchant_name}, merchant_id=#{u.merchant_id}, images=#{u.images} where id = #{u.id}
mapper.select: select * from product_category where been_deleted = ture
select * from product_category where id = #{id} and been_deleted = ture
select * from product_category where name = #{name} and been_deleted = ture
